app_descript:
Seamless: Local Food Delivery

Brief: Get your favorite meals delivered straight to your door with Seamless, the food delivery app that ties convenience with variety. Indulge in a wide array of local restaurants, popular chains, and even grocery items with the tap of a button. Powered by Grubhub, Seamless offers a user-friendly platform to satisfy your cravings at any time with transparent fees and real-time order tracking.

  • ğŸšš Real-time tracking of your delivery for updates from the moment your food leaves the restaurant to arrival at your door.
  • ğŸ’µ Seamless+ membership option for savings such as $0 delivery fees on eligible orders and credit back on pickups.
